geting_started_d: GIS tools provide a powerful way of exploring nearby financial touch points like Bank, ATM, Bank Mitra, Post Office and CSC through this mobile application with Google Maps Platform. Hereâ€™s a guide to get you started using Jan Dhan Darshak.
prerequisites_d: Location permissions and Internet will be required. (Minimum 3G Internet Speed will be required). Mobile operating systems: Android Jelly Bean, v16, 4.1.x or newer, and iOS 8 or newer.
functionalities_d: Map, Map Layers, Global Search, My Location & Near Me are the default functionalities in the main layout page.Feed Back form on place details window.
map_d: A map provides a background of geographical context for the content you wish to display.You can change between normal and satellite view of the map at any time. Click on Map layer button on top right of the map page. Nearby places will appear at bottom sheet.
zoom_d: This function helps the user to zoom and view any feature at required extent.Drag out and Drag in using two fingers will respectively Zoom In and Zoom Out the map. User can also double click on the map to zoom in.
gps_d: This function will be extremely helpful. This allows the user to come back to user current location with default extent.
menu_button_d: Click on menu button at top left corner to view menu options. This includes change langauge button along with other options.
search_d: Search provides user with an opportunity to look for a particular place on a map. Click on the search bar. Search box will expand, on text input the search suggestion will come. Type the place to be search and select from the suggestion list.
bottom_navigatio_d: This allows the user to quickly identify the services/facilities of the selected type (ATM, Bank, Bank Mitra,Post Office and CSC) within the specified location. It shows the complete list of all nearest places.
languages_d: This app is available in 12 local indian languages. Change language button can be found by clicking on menu button.
about_us_d: The Jan Dhan Darshak Mobile application provides an interface for Citizen to view the Banking infrastructure in India consisting of Bank Branches, ATMS and Bank Mitra locations. The data is collated by Department of Financial Services from Scheduled Commercial Banks both in Public and Private Sector.
disclaimer_1: The information contained in the mobile application is provided and maintained by various Scheduled commercial banks.
disclaimer_2: No guarantee is given as to the accuracy or currency of any of the data.
disclaimer_3: Therefore, in no event shall Department of Financial Services or its constituents be liable for any special, indirect, or consequential damages or any damages whatsoever resulting from loss of use, data, or profits, whether in an action of contract, negligence, or other action, arising out of or in connection with the use of the information herein provided.
disclaimer_4: The website is designed to serve as a secondary representation of Banking infrastructure, and is compiled from the Scheduled Commercial Banks which are the primary sources for this public information.
disclaimer_5: Users of this website are hereby notified that these primary sources should be consulted for verification of the information presented here. And Department of Financial Services or its constituents and the software developer, NIC, assume no legal responsibility for the information on this website.
